abstract: It is the first time Toyota has acknowledged that its internal review confirmed reports of sticking accelerator pedals and problematic floor mats that may have caused incidents of sudden acceleration.
snippet: It is the first time Toyota has acknowledged that its internal review confirmed reports of sticking accelerator pedals and problematic floor mats that may have caused incidents of sudden acceleration.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Toyota said Wednesday that its investigation of about 2,000 vehicles reported to experience sudden acceleration found evidence that sticking accelerator pedals and interference by floor mats — the subjects of two big recalls — did indeed cause some of the incidents.

headline.main: Toyota Concedes 2 Flaws Caused Loss of Control
headline.print_headline: Toyota Concedes 2 Flaws Caused Loss of Control
